name: Fix You (Global Game Jam Oslo 2020)
description:
A short experience about not giving up when things get hard, featuring the lovely bunch at Global Game Jame Oslo! We got together and bonded over the power of Coldplay, making a... unique cover. The theme was "Repair", and this is our take on it. With love from Oslo <3 

GGJ Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/fix-you-1

Controls: 

Movement: WASD/Arrow keys

Look: Mouse

Grab: Left mouse button

Rotate object: Right mouse when holding object
